pyliburo.analysisrulepalette module¶

class pyliburo.analysisrulepalette.BaseAnalysisRule¶

Bases: object

Attributes

Methods

for_shape_type¶

the shapetype the rule apply to: there are 6 shapetype, vertex, edge, face, shell, solid, compsolid, compound

dict_key¶

the key to the value that will be added to the geometry dictionary, the value to must always be a true or false (bool)

execute(occshape_dict_list)¶

the analysis rule is defined and the method executes the analysis rule
